choices.C: The computer has HIPS installed on it
choices.D: The computer has NIPS installed on it
choices.A: The computer has HIDS installed on it
choices.B: The computer has NIDS installed on it

questions.question_text:
You get an alert on your desktop computer showing that an attack was successful on the host but up on investigation you see that occurred duration the attack.
Which reason is true?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A, B, and C

choices.B: To connect more than two switches

questions.question_text: What is a trunk link used for?

choices.C: From a Cisco ASA to the Cisco FMC
choices.A: From a Cisco ASA to the Cisco OpenDNS service
choices.B: From a Cisco ASA to the Cisco WSA
choices.D: From a Cisco ISE session directory to other policy network systems, such as Cisco IOS devices and the Cisco ASA

questions.question_text: Cisco pxGrid has a unified framework with an open API designed in a hub-and-spoke architecture. pxGrid is used to enable the sharing of contextual-based information from which devices?
What would be the IPv6 address of a host using SLAAC with 2345::/64 as a network prefix and MAC address of 0300.1111.2222?

Access control entries (ACE), which are part of an access control list (ACL), can classify packets by inspecting Layer 2 through Layer 4 headers for a number of parameters, including which of the following items?

choices.B: Layer 3 protocol information such as ICMP, TCP, or UDP
choices.A: Layer 2 protocol information such as EtherTypes
choices.D: Layer 4 header information such as source and destination TCP or UDP ports
choices.C: Layer 3 header information such as source and destination IP addresses

discussion.content: B should not be correct. TCP and UDP are Layer 4 protocols
